channel.title: The forvision package for R on the Forvision project
channel.description: Recent content in The forvision package for R on the Forvision project

item.title: How to download and install
item.description: Installation You can install the development version of the forvision package (containing the latest improvements and bug fixes) from github: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("forvis/forvision") Problems and Issues Please report any issues you may encounter in our issues page on github

item.title: Loading data
item.description: Read data from URL (from example datasets) You can use the following methods to read data from URL sources: 1) Using function download.file(): temporaryFile <- tempfile() download.file("RUL", destfile=temporaryFile) myData <- read.csv(temporaryFile) 2) Using package RCurl: library(RCurl) myCsv <- getURL("RUL", ssl.verifypeer = FALSE) myData <- read.csv(textConnection(myCsv)) 3) Using R base function read.csv(): myData <- read.csv("RUL") You can use the RULs for examples datasets from the section datasets
